sentences.en: “a piece of the action in a Florida land deal”(&b{Shana Alexander})
sentences.cn: “佛罗里达土地条约中的一份收益”(&b{莎纳·亚历山大})

sentences.en: "It's a nice piece of jewellery though, isn't it?"
sentences.cn: “可这是一件漂亮的首饰，不是吗？”

sentences.en: Chop the potato into bite-sized pieces.
sentences.cn: 把马铃薯切成小块。

sentences.en: Cut off a piece of wood 5 cm in length.
sentences.cn: 截下一段五厘米长的木头。

sentences.en: Foote's most recent play, "Dividing the Estate," is an ensemble piece.
sentences.cn: 福特的最新戏剧《分房产》是个合演剧目。

sentences.en: he's a nasty piece of work.
sentences.cn: 他是个下流坯子。

sentences.en: His father had taught him how to take a gun to pieces .
sentences.cn: 他父亲教过他怎么拆枪。

sentences.en: His trousers were held up with a piece of string.
sentences.cn: 他的裤子靠一根细绳系着。

sentences.en: How very thoughtless. I'll give him a piece of my mind.
sentences.cn: 真是太没头脑了，我要告诉他我很生气。

sentences.en: I disagree with Andrew Russell over his piece on British Rail.
sentences.cn: 我不同意安德鲁·拉塞尔那篇关于英国铁路公司的文章。

sentences.en: I'll answer your questions when I've said my piece.
sentences.cn: 说完我想说的，我会回答你的问题。

sentences.en: Individual pieces of text can be cut and pasted to their correct position.
sentences.cn: 文字的每一段都可以剪贴到正确位置上。

sentences.en: It was the most unexpected piece of news one could possibly imagine.
sentences.cn: 这条新闻最出人意料了，真是让人想象不到。

sentences.en: jigsaw pieces
sentences.cn: 拼图的拼片

sentences.en: Mr. Long was now cutting himself a piece of the pink cake.
sentences.cn: 朗先生正在给自己切一块粉色蛋糕。

sentences.en: Strain the juice through a piece of gauze or a sieve.
sentences.cn: 用一块纱布或过滤网将果汁过滤一下。

sentences.en: That's a beautiful piece of work. You should be proud of it.
sentences.cn: 那件作品非常漂亮，你应当为之自豪。

sentences.en: The fireplace was carefully dismantled piece by piece (= one part at a time ) .
sentences.cn: 壁炉被小心地逐块拆下。

sentences.en: The piece segues into his solo with the strings.
sentences.cn: 曲终后紧接着就是他的弦乐独奏。

sentences.en: The piece was reduced in size by planing down the four corners.
sentences.cn: 这块木头的4个角刨过后就变小了。

sentences.en: The shelving comes to pieces (= divides into separate parts ) for easy transport.
sentences.cn: 架子可以拆卸，以便运输。

sentences.en: The shower head just came to pieces (= broke into separate parts ) in my hand.
sentences.cn: 花洒就在我手中裂开了。

sentences.en: There was a piece of cloth tied to the dog's collar.
sentences.cn: 狗项圈上系着一条布。

sentences.en: This piece is, what, about a half an hour long?
sentences.cn: 这首曲子有，嗯，大约半个小时那么长，对吗？

sentences.en: to piece together a jigsaw
sentences.cn: 拼合拼图

sentences.en: Today, as usual, he was wearing a three-piece suit.
sentences.cn: 像往常一样，他今天穿的是三件套。

sentences.en: took the clock apart piece by piece.
sentences.cn: 一点一点地把钟表拆开

sentences.en: We’re witnessing a piece of history in the making.
sentences.cn: 我们正在见证一段新的历史。

sentences.en: When I produced this piece of work, my lecturers were very critical.
sentences.cn: 当我拿出这件作品时，我的讲师们提出了诸多批评意见。

sentences.en: Would you like a small or a large piece?
sentences.cn: 你想要一小块还是一大块？

phrases.phrase: a piece (或 slice) of the action
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)刺激活动的一个构成部分
指责：坦白而严厉的指责；严苛的批评
一段音乐；一首音乐；一首乐曲
难事；一件作品；一项工作
粗加工工件；粗加工部分；首片
完好的（地），未受伤的（地），未损坏的（地），平安无恙的（地）
相似的，同类的：属于同种属或同种类的
（跌倒后）重新爬起来（对小孩讲的话） 收拾残局；收拾残局
轻而易举的事情；轻松愉快的事
一份：一个行动或收益应分得的一份
严厉批评，批驳得体无完肤
试样；制取试样的金属块；[音]参赛或命题曲目
工作物；半制品；被加工件

trans.tran_cn: 块，碎片，部件，一件，一块，项，文章，艺术品，硬币，棋子，部分，枪
trans.tran_en: an amount of something that has been separated from the main part

trans.tran_cn: 组合资料（以便了解情况），拼凑
trans.tran_en: to put all the separate parts of sth together to make a complete whole
